w :  if i were you  i ' d be more careful about locking the back door at night .
m :  don ' t worry .  no one will break in .

question: what does the woman worry about ?
choice: the man will not be able to sleep .
someone will enter the back door while the man is sleeping .
the lock on the door will break .
answer: someone will enter the back door while the man is sleeping .
